divs: Sighting DetailsWhile my sister and I were standing on the front pourch we looked up and noticed what first looked like a really bright airplan with lots of lights it moved across the eastern sky for about 3 min real slow then it shot stright up and dimmed out and looked like a star in orbit of the planet and moved very very slowly until it was out of eyesight.
Summary: Star like object moving slow across the sky
